name: The Lonely Knight (André Servidoni)
description:
The Lonely Knight is a single player tower defense game that will require the player to survive several nights to defend the private treasure from the High King.
You are a Knight that is having trouble finding a job in the kingdom. The global crisis
finally arrived and the opportunities are rare.

One day, while drinking in a tavern, after another interview that was not so good, you saw an advertisement saying that the High King was looking
for a mercenary to guard his private treasure tower. Without hesitation you apply for the opportunity.

In the interview you discover why the spot was open. Since there are high value items inside the tower, during the night enemies attack the tower to try to steal the money, and the King, as a good penny-pincher, wants only one person to guard it. But since you need money to pay for that brand new horse you got, you accept the challenge.

Engine: Unity
Status: Released
Release: 31th January 2023
Version: 1.0.0(81)

This game was produced for the Tavern Game Jam: January Edition
